name: Slovak Hydrogen Association
goal: The Association supports members in understanding and enhancing the prospects for hydrogen and fuel cells in Slovakia, and acts on behalf of its members to accelerate the commercialisation of these clean energy solutions.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
We follow the Fuel Cell and Hydrogen Joint Undertaking (FCH JU) agenda. We promote clean transport, energy and industry using CO2 free hydrogen technologies.
Using the hydrogen application in Slovakia, we can contribute to meet the goals of the EU Green Deal.
